  Datasource to retrieve a PingOne Risk Predictor.
---

# pingone_risk_predictor (Data Source)

Datasource to retrieve a PingOne Risk Predictor.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pingone_risk_predictor" "example" {
  environment_id = var.environment_id
  name           = "Risk Predictor X"
}

data "pingone_risk_predictor" "example_by_id" {
  environment_id    = var.environment_id
  risk_predictor_id = var.risk_predictor_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The ID of the environment to retrieve the risk predictor from.

### Optional

- `name` (String) The name of the risk predictor.  Exactly one of the following must be defined: `risk_predictor_id`, `name`.
- `risk_predictor_id` (String) The ID of the risk predictor to retrieve.  Exactly one of the following must be defined: `risk_predictor_id`, `name`.  Must be a valid PingOne resource ID.

### Read-Only

- `compact_name` (String) A string that specifies the compact name of the risk predictor. This is a unique name for the predictor.
- `default` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the default result schema for the risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--default))
- `deletable` (Boolean) A boolean that specifies whether the risk predictor is deletable.
- `description` (String) A string that specifies the description of the risk predictor.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `licensed` (Boolean) A boolean that specifies whether the risk predictor is licensed.
- `predictor_adversary_in_the_middle` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Adversary In The Middle risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_adversary_in_the_middle))
- `predictor_anonymous_network` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Anonymous Network risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_anonymous_network))
- `predictor_bot_detection` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Bot Detection risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_bot_detection))
- `predictor_composite` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Composite risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_composite))
- `predictor_custom_map` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Custom Map risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_custom_map))
- `predictor_device` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Device risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_device))
- `predictor_email_reputation` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Email Reputation risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_email_reputation))
- `predictor_geovelocity` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Geovelocity risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_geovelocity))
- `predictor_ip_reputation` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the IP Reputation risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_ip_reputation))
- `predictor_traffic_anomaly` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Traffic Anomaly risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_traffic_anomaly))
- `predictor_user_location_anomaly` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the User Location Anomaly risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_user_location_anomaly))
- `predictor_user_risk_behavior` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the User Risk Behavior risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_user_risk_behavior))
- `predictor_velocity` (Attributes) A single object that specifies the configuration for the Velocity risk predictor. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--predictor_velocity))
- `type` (String) A string that specifies the type of the risk predictor.
